 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Organisational Change - Country Management

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1765&user=10620> 	

Shereen Assal has been appointed Managing Director – Egypt, effective September 1st, reporting to both the Managed Companies and Country Management Verticals. 
Shereen will lead country-wide operations alongside her current role in Retail, driving strategic growth, operational excellence, and cross-functional performance. Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1765&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

Strategic MoU with AUK

chunks.text:
Shereen Assal has been appointed Managing Director – Egypt, effective September 1st, reporting to both the Managed Companies and Country Management Verticals. 
Shereen will lead country-wide operations alongside her current role in Retail, driving strategic growth, operational excellence, and cross-functional performance. Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1765&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

Strategic MoU with AUK

Our Kuwait team signed a strategic Memorandum of Understanding with the Australian University of Kuwait to foster collaboration in talent development, including internships, recruitment, and knowledge exchange.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1766&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

Tanagra’s New “Shop by Room” Feature

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1767&user=10620> 	

Explore Tanagra’s latest collections with our newest app feature, Shop by Room. Effortlessly navigate curated selections tailored to every space, from refined dining areas to stylish living rooms. Whether refreshing a corner or redesigning a whole room, find the perfect piece with ease.

Download the App now and reimagine your space. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-1-min.png> 	

Download Now, Access Anytime




Be ready, wherever you are.

Download the App now and reimagine your space.

Download Now, Access Anytime




Be ready, wherever you are. 

Download key documents from One Chalhoub and keep your essentials at your fingertips, even offline.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1768&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-7-min.png> 	

Chat Instantly from the New Outlook


 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1769&user=10620> 	

Save time and reduce email back-and-forth with the latest Microsoft 365 update. You can now launch a Microsoft Teams chat directly from Outlook email or calendar. Just hover over a name, click the chat icon, and start messaging. Perfect for quick clarifications and faster collaboration.
Need help? Contact the IT Service Desk or visit the Tech Hub.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/06-4-min.png> 	

WEEKLY INTERNAL OPPORTUNITIES
